```{r}
# load libraries ----
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)

# check out the column names ----
names(penguins)

# look at the dimensions of the df ----
dim(penguins)

# get a summary of the df ----
summary(penguins)

# get a summary using {skimr} ----
skimr:: skim(penguins)

# head & tail ----
head(penguins, n=3)
tail(penguins)

# pairsplot ----
GGally::ggpairs(penguins, 
                columns= 3:6, 
                ggplot2::aes(color= species))

# create histogram of penguin flipper lengths
ggplot(data= penguins, aes(x= flipper_length_mm, fill= species)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
